isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - HEATER AND AIR CONDITIONER - DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: Air Conditioner With Day Cab and Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: The air conditioner system produces cool air by way of a refrigeration evaporator coil located under the passenger seat. The unit has two blower motors and a compressor control circuit. The compressor control circuit is tied to the blower motor circuit which can be set to off, low, medium or high speed to circulate heating or cooling air to the cab and sleeper.
